scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:RequestGroupMembership-Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($group = $core_v2_group.Current) #set ($groupType = $core_v2_group.Current.GroupType) #set ($user = $core_v2_user.Accessing) #set ($isRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($user.Id)) #set ($groupUser = false) #set ($groupUser = $core_v2_groupUserMember.Get($group.Id, "%{UserId = $user.Id}")) #set ($canJoinGroup = $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_groupPermissions.JoinGroup, $user.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $group.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_group.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) #set ($canJoinGroupByRequest = $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_groupPermissions.JoinGroupByRequest, $user.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $group.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_group.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) $core_v2_language.GetResource("RequestMembership") $core_v2_page.RenderThemeHeaders("%{ IsModal = 'True'}")
#if (!$isRegistered)
$core_v2_language.GetResource('MustLogin')
#elseif ($group.GroupType == 'Joinless')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('CannotJoinJoinlessGroup')
#elseif ($groupUser && $groupUser.MembershipType == 'PendingMember')
$core_v2_language.GetResource('RequestPending')
#elseif ($groupUser && !$groupUser.HasErrors())
$core_v2_language.GetResource('AlreadyMember')
#else
$core_v2_language.GetResource('Instructions')
    #if ($group.GroupType != 'PublicOpen')
    • #end
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('Submit')
#end
